title: Kamala Harris and Hillary Clinton focus on women’s rights at rally with Kathy Hochul.
description: Ms. Hochul called in two national figures as recent polls showed her Republican challenger gaining ground in the New York governor’s race.
dc:creator: Jeffery C. Mays

media:content.media:description: Vice President Kamala Harris, left, and Hillary Clinton, right, joined New York Gov. Kathy Hochul at a rally focused on women’s rights on Wednesday.
